sourcesContent:
Videos

Playlist
Search
{{video.channelTitle}} - {{video.title}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { PlaylistDTO, VideoDTO } from '../DTOs/PlaylistDTO'; @Component({ selector: 'app-test', templateUrl: './test.component.html', styleUrls: ['./test.component.css'] }) export class TestComponent { http!: HttpClient; baseUrl!: string; formBuilder!: FormBuilder; isLoading: boolean = false; loadPlaylistForm!: FormGroup; resultSearchForm!: FormGroup; playlist!: PlaylistDTO; videosToDisplay!: VideoDTO[]; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string, formBuilder: FormBuilder) { this.http = http; this.baseUrl = baseUrl; this.formBuilder = formBuilder; this.loadPlaylistForm = formBuilder.group({ playlistLink: ['https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLNL_Z6NDFLJZafBMO4kA9PbNBq0t-f9hx'], }); this.resultSearchForm = formBuilder.group({ searchInput: [''], }); } public getPlaylistLinkInput(): string { return this.loadPlaylistForm.controls.playlistLink.value as string; } public getSearchInput(): string { return this.resultSearchForm.controls.searchInput.value as string; } public PlaylistSubmit() { var playlistID = this.getPlaylistLinkInput().includes('https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=') ? this.loadPlaylistForm.controls.playlistLink.value.split('=')[1] : this.loadPlaylistForm.controls.playlistLink.value; this.isLoading = true; this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'playlist/GetPlaylistFromYT?playlistID=' + playlistID).subscribe(result => { //this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'playlist/GetPlaylistFromYT?playlistID=' + 'PLNL_Z6NDFLJZafBMO4kA9PbNBq0t-f9hx').subscribe(result => { //http.get(baseUrl + 'playlist/GetPlaylistFromYT?playlistID=' + 'PL0B8BA4C14B6FB93D').subscribe(result => { this.playlist = result; this.videosToDisplay = this.playlist.videos; this.isLoading = false; console.log(this.playlist); }, error => { console.error(error); this.isLoading = false; }); } public ResultsSearch() { var searchString = this.getSearchInput().toLowerCase(); this.videosToDisplay = this.playlist.videos.filter(x => x.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchString) || x.channelTitle.toLowerCase().includes(searchString)); } }
